recipe_text: Quantity; 450; Prepare 450 grams of spaghetti| Measurement; 450; Measure out 450 grams of ground beef| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of onion, chopped| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of garlic, minced| Measurement; 800; Measure out 800 grams of tomato sauce| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of sugar| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of dried oregano| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Measurement; 200; Measure out 200 grams of cheddar cheese, shredded| Untimed; None; Cook spaghetti according to package instructions| Untimed; None; Drain spaghetti and set aside| Untimed; None; In a skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned| Untimed; None; Add onion and garlic to the skillet and cook until softened| Untimed; None; Stir in tomato sauce, sugar, oregano, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Simmer the sauce for 10 minutes| Untimed; None; Preheat oven to 175 degrees C (350 degrees F)| Untimed; None; Combine cooked spaghetti and sauce in a baking dish| Untimed; None; Sprinkle cheddar cheese over the top| Timed; 1800; Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes| Finish; None; Serve hot!
title: Basic Baked Spaghetti
